habitation_module.name: Habitation Module
habitation_module.desc: More room for workers, more free time to twirl mustaches. Become the capitalist you were meant to be!

urban_module.name: Urban Module
urban_module.desc: High-density space housing. Now let's get those people some jobs.

metropolis_module.name: Metropolis Module
metropolis_module.desc: Extremely optimized housing to manage truly large populations.

recycling_module.name: Recycling Module
recycling_module.desc: Break down any item into its base components, although at a loss.

experimental_module.name: Experimental Module
experimental_module.desc: Perform experiments to figure out new blueprints or duplicate existing ones.
